en.name: Saheeh International
en.text: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

2.text: Praise be to Allah, the Lord of all the worlds.

en.name: Saheeh International
en.text: Praise be to Allah, the Lord of all the worlds.

3.text: The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

en.name: Saheeh International
en.text: The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

4.text: Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.

en.name: Saheeh International
en.text: Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.

5.text: You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help.

en.name: Saheeh International
en.text: You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help.

6.text: Guide us on the Straight Path,

en.name: Saheeh International
en.text: Guide us on the Straight Path,
